entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
